items.sentence: I don\'t think there\'s any chance that Tom will help you.
It\'s normal to be curious about what others think of you.
I just wanted to tell Tom how much I appreciated his help.
Tom didn\'t believe me when I told him what Mary had done.
People say that Japan is the richest country in the world.
Since I wrote the report in a hurry, it had many mistakes.
Tom opened the refrigerator and reached for a can of beer.
Tom opened the refrigerator, looking for something to eat.
Tom opened the venetian blinds and looked out at the view.
We need to find out what time we\'re supposed to be there.
